alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Marshall; Pottawatomie; Riley; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 10:06PM CDT until July 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Riley County in northeastern Kansas... Pottawatomie County in northeastern Kansas... West central Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... East central Clay County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Washington County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Marshall County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 1006 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Frankfort to 8 miles southwest of Waterville to Green, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blue Rapids, Westmoreland, Blaine, Onaga, Olsburg, Randolph, Green, Wheaton and Tuttle Creek Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Jackson; Marshall; Pottawatomie; Riley; Washington
